publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-1901 Mr Mike Rumbles on behalf of the Standards Committee: Standards Commissioner—That the Parliament agrees to the proposal for a Committee Bill under Rule 9.15 contained in the Standards Committee’s 2nd Report 2001 Proposals for a Standards Commissioner Committee Bill (SP Paper 312).
